column5: Our open and airy 4 Bd/2.5 ba home is the perfect place for friends or family to spend the Holidays. We are within a 10min (5mile) drive to all Dallas has to offer: Downtown, Uptown, 5 star dining, shopping, golf, and only 2 miles from White Rock Lake! Relax here and enjoy the home and outdoor space, or easy access to I30 will take you anywhere in the DFW Metroplex.
column8: Modern Home for the Holiday! Minutes from Downtown
